name: Alvin, the Wolf, and the Horrible Hurrofs
name_original: Alvin, the Wolf, and the Horrible Hurrofs
description:
My humble Lost Vikings and Calvin and Hobbes-inspired GMTK 2021 entry.

Explore a mysterious forest, face down horrible monsters, and scheme with your best friend in your secret hideout. Your two characters have very different abilities and skills and so depend on each others to survive. Will you succumb to the many terrors of the woods, or will you make it home in time for dinner?

Play time is about five to 10 minutes.
